    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:25.199
    | text      = And we have got an incredible news alert for you today
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:30.959

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:40.720

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:45.039

}}

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:07.200

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:13.919

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:35.200
    | text      = And if you pay attention to the way he operates with his narratives
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:38.720
    | text      = This I think is a huge indication that he's looking for an off-ramp from the COVID hysteria
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:43.600
    | text      = And all those associated storylines that have dominated the show for the last two years
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:47.679
    | text      = I'm going to attempt to lay out the picture of what I mean by this
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = And I'm going to start by addressing the reality and falsity of the news that Alex is covering
}}

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:03.120

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:40.879

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:43.200

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:52.960

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:55.039

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:57.679
    | text      = Right
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:58.879
    | text      = Here in the United States, the Supreme Court ruled that Biden's vaccine or test mandate for businesses wasn't going to stand
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:04.559
    | text      = But that it was still appropriate in healthcare settings
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:07.200
    | text      = In terms of what restrictions exist, the CDC doesn't really set any of that
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:11.360
    | text      = They give recommendations and then the actual decisions are mostly a state-by-state thing
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:15.919
    | text      = And various states are taking wildly different approaches

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:18.480

{{TranscriptBlock

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

    | timestamp = 00:14:53.120

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:58.559

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:21.679
    | text      = Then gradually heading back to normal over a matter of months
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:24.879
    | text      = At the same time, Quebec has decided to not lift any restrictions
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:28.799
    | text      = The point here is that different places make different decisions
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

    | text      = Putting aside the real world for a second, it's critical to understand the move that Alex is making with his narrative

{{TranscriptBlock
